charges.charge_description: WARRANT OUT OF MIDDLE DISTRICT OF FLORIDA, JACKSONVILLE DIVISION-Knowingly, willfully and intentionally combine, conspire, confederate and agree with each other and with Perry Jackson Murray, Stephen Jackson Murray, Steven Wayne Hixon, Arnold Timothy Luyck, Robert Casey O'Hanrahan, and with others to the grand jury known and unknown to distribute marijuana, a Schedule I controlled substance. 21:841(a)(l)
